content: learn how to crochet an easy water bottle holder with this beginner-friendly pattern whether going hiking or running errands a water bottle holder will help you stay hydrated and keep your hands free keep reading for a free pattern that includes detailed instructions on how to crochet a sturdy carrying strap and tips to customize your project to fit different size water bottles **crochet techniques to know** don t worry if you re new to crochet this project only requires a few basic techniques single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch increases decreases **materials** yarn choose a light worsted cotton yarn in a color of your choice crochet hook use a hook size to match the gauge i recommend a us g/4 0mm hook scissors stitch markers optional tapestry needle **finished size** the body is 7″ tall 2 5″ diameter unstretched the strap is 38″ unstretched and 48″ stretched **gauge** 20 sts and 8 row = 4″ in double_crochet worked in the round strap gauge 19 sts = 4″ in strap pattern unstretched
